name: Lizhuang Ma
content: People - DMCV Lab Group Leader Prof. Lizhuang Ma Lizhuang Ma, distinguished professor of SJTU and ECNU, director of "Digital Media and Computer Vision Laboratory", director of "SenseTime-SJTU Deep Learning and Computer Vision Joint Laboratory", vice president of the Institute of Artificial Intelligence in SJTU. He is the recipient of national outstanding Youth Foundation (å½å®¶æ°é), first class member of China National Hundred-Thousand-Ten thousand Talent Plan (åç¾ä¸äººæå·¥ç¨), vice chairman of the China Society of Image and Graphics "Computer Animation and Digital Entertainment Committee", director of Information Science and Technology Center at Shanghai University of Traditional Chinese Medicine. Professor Ma has gotten the China Youth Science and Technology Award, the State Ministry of Education Science and Technology Progress Award, the Shanghai Science and Technology Progress Award, Zhejiang Century Academic and Technology Leaders; special allowance of the State Council, Shanghai Young Leading Scientists. He stayed in CAD & CG State Key laboratory 1992-2002, and was as a visiting professor at CAMTech Advanced Multimedia Center of Singapore's Nanyang Technological University in 1999-2000. Since 2002, he has been the distinguished professor in Shanghai Jiao Tong University.
